hiveArticle.title: [GoldenHourPhotography] Source of Light
hiveArticle.body:
This Image was taken in Puri Beach in the morning, when Sun was rising and it making everyone happy with its warm rays. This was a winter morning but a lot of people were still there in the beach to just get a glance of first ray of the Sun.

![IMG_20180108_071933.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZtTdcSpUF6douyqz4CiwRXrrThjUC1rJUk66TheEiptb/IMG_20180108_071933.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
